item.title: Writing a Yara Parser
item.description: It’s been a while since I wrote yara rules. In fact, the last time I did, I was still using vscode. I needed now to write one. So I chose to look at one of my local yara rules repo. Opened it in nvim and … no syntax highlighting. Easy fix though. Treesitter is what provides highlighting for my setup, so I did :TSInstall yara. Damn!! No yara parser. That meant I had to write a custom one.
